sense.gloss: piece(s) of firewood (esp. chopped or split from logs)
kindling (twigs, branches, etc.), firewood
wood and charcoal, fuel
going through thick and thin to attain one's objective, enduring unspeakable hardships for the sake of vengeance
fuel and water, firewood and water
gathering firewood and drawing water, kitchen work, housework
firewood gathering
hatchet, axe
wood-chopping, wood-splitting
noh theater performed at night by a fire
woodshed
kindling burned in shrines and temples
special kindling used in samurai families during the Edo period for the 15th of the first month and painted with 12 brush strokes (13 on a lucky year)
kindling offered by officials to the imperial court during the ritsuryō period

r_ele.r: たきぎをいだいてひをすくう

sense.gloss: having one's good intentions backfire dangerously, causing harm when trying to prevent it, trying to put out a fire while carrying kindling
menial services (e.g. kitchen work), serving one's master unsparingly

r_ele.r: しんすいきゅうよれい

sense.gloss: Order for the Provision of Firewood and Water (1842)
wood basket, firewood bucket, log holder
brushwood and firewood
wood-burning stove, wood stove

sdata.j: くすぶっていた↑薪↑↓たきぎ↓が↑突然↑↓とつぜん↓↑燃↑↓も↓え↑上↑↓あ↓がった。
sdata.e: The smoldering firewood burst into flame.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑長↑↓なが↓い↑間↑↓ま↓↑臥薪嘗胆↑↓がしんしょうたん↓の↑苦↑↓くる↓しみをなめた。
sdata.e: I have struggled under extreme difficulties for a long time.

sdata.j: ↑薪割↑↓まきわ↓りを↑好↑↓この↓む↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑多↑↓おお↓いのは↑理解↑↓りかい↓できる。
sdata.e: I know why there are so many people who love chopping wood.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑椅子↑↓いす↓を↑叩↑↓たた↓き↑壊↑↓こわ↓して↑薪↑↓たきぎ↓にした。
sdata.e: He broke up the chair for firewood.

sdata.j: おっと！↑火種↑↓ひだね↓が↑残↑↓のこ↓りすくないぞ！↑薪割↑↓まきわ↓りしてくれ！
sdata.e: Whoops! There aren't many live coals left! Go make some kindling would you?

sdata.j: ↑薪↑↓たきぎ↓が↑足↑↓た↓りず、はやくも↑火勢↑↓かせい↓が↑衰↑↓おとろ↓えはじめた↑暖炉↑↓だんろ↓。
sdata.e: The fireplace, lacking firewood, flames already starting to lose their vigour.

sdata.j: ↑毎日↑↓まいにち↓↑薪割↑↓まきわ↓りをしています。
トムは↑薪割↑↓まきわ↓りしてるよ。
トムは↑薪↑↓まき↓を↑割↑↓わ↓ってるよ。
↑暖炉↑↓だんろ↓には↑薪↑↓まき↓が↑足↑↓た↓りず、↑早↑↓はや↓くも↑火勢↑↓かせい↓が↑衰↑↓おとろ↓え↑始↑↓はじ↓めている。
sdata.e: Without enough wood on the fire, the flames are already beginning to die down.

sdata.j: もう↑一↑↓いっ↓↑本↑↓ぽん↓、↑暖炉↑↓だんろ↓に↑薪↑↓まき↓をくべて。
sdata.e: Put another log in the fireplace.
